overview: Tanya is a bored mother with nothing but the fingers on her hand to keep her company. This mother's day she brings her daughter Anikka to her favorite new spa to show her what fun they can have getting massages together as mother and daughter. Anikka is suspicious when she is made to bathe in rose petals with her mom but when Lyla and Lizz (their expert masseuses) join them for an oily massage, Anikka soon discovers more than just a fun rub. Be there for some of the most heinous tactics of seduction, all spurred on by the lusty feelings their own stepmothers put them up to satisfying! This action packed compilation of All Girl Massages also features some of our most tantalizing lesbian family roleplay scenes featuring Cherie DeVille, Brandi Love and Ariella Ferrera as seductive stepmoms and Belle Knox, Dillion Harper, Carter Cruise, Evi Foxx and Aaliyah Love as their budding teens. Sit back and enjoy every minute from these spellbindingly seductive MILFs!
title: Mother Daughter Spa Day
